EmailTemplate.subject: PCSB Tech and Information Systems virtualized environment (1494244567.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Thomas – After doing some research on the Technology and Information Systems’ infrastructure environment I think you would see a lot of value in our ability to allow teams to continue to scale out their virtualized infrastructure at a lower cost. Our control platform does what VMware’s VRops and VSphere <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jExRccLLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAX65SjTrmoHbf4JcZbFhksJu8u6w0WRY%2DpuHikjeCBIjdFx1Yi6zcIZyiDbXBLlxchmDonn2E5chuyQDtYkDz6uxWKqa8UWr2XDk4BuEHUVTwMrIx2%5FsWLdnrdoti2A8xl0cdc3symbo5YV0kxVr7MJ9oE9p0cZrIps4uRKEeDDZ3KLtS7piUYzgybbDlM94bBMdnYcjInrQHnamNtjBbSRZ30K1mzphBxNYPwlXUPoswEGVhGJ4U%2DlcE3KOoAM5%5FVcTxaoLio7KvHaCal%2DzbAnYlweC6lL9dMdEhA%2C%2C/j0hQeMTJLFlNoVdlsbPWNKT5iifCdda%5Fsq9pAPao0cAzlkV7duXOKw793oRdTZk5MuDLXg8bB691zwcFSPigXat68NZYB1W%5FTjfJ1eSIScgcU7Um9ZZv9qKW8EYEhNyQhnDpMXZbElx5TzCoeqYJsRrOMZwWWEbU3j6SEQ%2C%2C]]> can’t because our automation engine gives the intelligence to virtual machines to size and place themselves within the environment, allowing teams to keep their environment in a perpetual state of health, enabling teams to: Assure Application Performance in Real Time o 80% decrease in tickets and alerts (become more operationally efficient) o Preventing problems before they become issues (we are the only platform that does this) Drive Efficiency in Environment o 40% increase in VM/Host Density as workloads get the intelligence to dictate the resources they need, saving hundreds of thousands of CapEx in the infrastructure.Capacity Plano Forecasting and tons of “what-if” scenarios around h/w refresh, DC moves, Consolidations etc...Below are some examples of how Turbonomic has helped other counties/public schools in the past but if you would like to see a live demonstration of the technology, please don’t hesitate to reach out and I’d be happy to arrange. Turbonomic ROI <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jExRccLLKlxQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhcAX65SjTrmoHbf4JcZbFhksJu8u6w0WRY%2DpuHikjeCBIjdFx1Yi6zcIZyiDbXBLlxchmDonn2E5chuyQDtYkDz6uxWKqa8UWr2XDk4BuEHUVTwMrIx2%5FsWLdnrdoti2A8xl0cdc3symbo5YV0kxVr7MJ9oE9p0cZrIps4uRKEeDDZ3KLtS7piUYzgybbDlM94bBMdnYcjInrQHnamNtjBbSRZ30K1mzphBxNYPwlXUPoswEGVhGJ4U%2DlcE3KOoAM5%5FVcTxaoLio7KvHaCal%2DzbAnYlweC6lL9dMdEhA%2C%2C/j0lYdMfPK1lNoVdlsbPWNrz%5FnTrOdZWhuPJ%2DBvqpxd9z2kdwZunBLA76mN9eHZYhKt2LEwAfHZ9syQ9nKM%2D8MpBE%5FKpQAFWNTDT03fPCWqxlS75Q2c118r6p7jVA%2DPvHwH7NXGZZTnhmVy67aJEhlinLFagaClGq71D3AJQ6tR0vrLwI45XuLpfxqFc%2C]]> Seminole County Public Schools: <[[http://info.turbonomic.com/ol/jEtWdsbOI1xQsRpg5uiMMKvivTDUe5u9qKgwWbq2n59ziQVuYOPLdRGphcBWFZZvNa%2DaCAZNQsIylEpLFL3FOoVJ%5FqhRDkK6Vj7tlIHKbJ5MP7th24d09qz4iCYAssmQkwHhPWIXRllCfT%5FPZbQQsBS1HYonBwGw3GvDEosorBwMjJAO58eFSYaj10eO%5FGqUxSGgE2QtyeLK4nGICJNGr%5F0IhUwe438SerPYsRyU7591sAgx2L9xqiZ29K4iechlxgezZgn24N30XNE8G%2DGDuNCjv%5FADeRw60pEvTEPEEAnqG4ywV3NI%5FBzVoxAWBQpnBAReIcUmljezs3ptWuw7YTi8miABzG0s5K9v9r%5FhiCLIfXq4bjDHtk32lknmbw%2C%2C/j0FVcsLGLllNoVdlsbPWJbvomjvDc4qrt7kzH%5Fryx9081gZ9feGAPVn7jcFfHZ5%5FaeCQCkwaAIBgnxlKFr2daJRQ6bAOKgTgfn6tprXPfY9Bf7t%2D1cIv%5FKeonTIjvc3PkVPCHUoAVDQ%2DQhONZbAhgC6iYrYXShGF9XXOOI4g0RsrtY5J5Yeofran6D6T4UvU9XueMFc76cqP1UizB8Q4g%2DIglHsuy1R3T%2DHg1jndh%2D4HrC9u2P1lyE5N%2DMRkEMhCpUGvfXTn3bfBGrpDV56EpfHrlcgORh87voJrKEqUen8%2C]]> With Turbonomic’s real-time capacity management to simulate a migration from old Dell hosts to new Cisco UCS blades, the team learned they could consolidate from 12 hosts down to 3, enabling them to save nearly $80,000. These funds can now be reallocated to new projects focused on innovation, such as collapsing and centralizing much of their remote site infrastructure to enable more unified IT management. Best regards, James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]> Going to Cisco Live?
